instructions: Image titled Make Friends Lists on Facebook Step 1 1 Open Facebook. Go to https://www.facebook.com/ in your preferred web browser. This will open your Facebook News Feed if you're logged in. If you aren't logged in, enter your email address (or phone number) and password in the top-right side of the page. Image titled Make Friends Lists on Facebook Step 2 2 Click . It's an option in the column on the left-hand side of the Facebook News Feed. You may have to click See More here in order to show this option. Image titled Make Friends Lists on Facebook Step 3 3 Click . This button is at the top of the Friend Lists page. Image titled Make Friends Lists on Facebook Step 4 4 Enter a list name. Click the "List Name" box and type in your preferred name for the list. Image titled Make Friends Lists on Facebook Step 5 5 Click . This will create your friend list and open it. You can add friends to this list by clicking the "Members" text box, typing in a name, and clicking the related friend in the drop-down menu that appears. Advertisement
